# [Epic] Hypothesis AI Agent - Experimentation Framework

## Overview
AI agent for running structured experiments on content and campaigns.

## Stories
- [ ] ORB-046: Create A/B test framework
- [ ] ORB-047: Implement content experiments

## Acceptance Criteria
- Define experiment with control/variant
- Statistical significance calculation
- Auto-winner selection option
- Results dashboard with confidence intervals

## Dependencies
- Epic 3.3 (Orchestration)

## Technical Notes
- Experiment definition and tracking models
- Statistical significance calculation (chi-square, t-test)
- Integration with content publishing for variant delivery
- Results visualization with confidence intervals
